name: acha-dinhos-landing
description: Landing page para o grupo Acha Dinhos com analytics integrado

scripts.build: mkdir -p public && cp -r *.html *.css *.js *.svg *.png logo public/ 2>/dev/null || (mkdir public 2>nul & copy *.html public\ & copy *.css public\ & copy *.js public\ & copy *.svg public\ & xcopy logo public\logo\ /E /I)

author: JvMeloxx
